channel.title: How do i add donator icon?
channel.description:
i want to add donator crown next to donator names
my client is 317 plz help

item.title: How do i add donator icon?
item.dc:creator: @The_cook_from_runesc The cook from runescape
item.description:
@The_cook_from_runesc wrote:

He doesn’t know, he’s just giving you a tip in the right direction

I don’t know either, but I can give you a bit more information. First of all you need to make sure there is an actual donor ranking, ie 4. This may be difficult because your commands probably rely on the owner having playerrights >= 3 so you’ll need to go through and change these if you haven’t already done so.

Now for the client, it’ll be a lot easier if your server has custom sprites and icons where you can actually see and edit the mod and admin icons. You’ll need to go through the code and find the part where these icons are loaded by searching the filename, then copy and edit what’s appropriate for the new icon.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add donator icon?
